nsfwblur-desc: Blurs images whose file description contains '__NSFW__', respecting user profile preference.
nsfwblur-toggle-tip: To change this, go to Preferences → Appearance → Files
nsfwblur-pref-dob: Date of birth (required for NSFW content)
nsfwblur-pref-nsfw-age: You must be at least 18 years old (based on your profile) to change this setting.
nsfwblur-birthyear-help: Stored privately in your account preferences and only used to decide whether NSFW images may be unblurred.
